Upgrade instructions for CKEditor 4 package
============================================

1. Download from vendor website: http://ckeditor.com/download
- Click on 'Online Builder' button at the 'Customize' section.
- Choose button "Upload build-config.js" and select this file from the old CKEditor in Scribite.
- At 'Download' button, choose 'Optimized' package.
- Extract archive and include in new version as subdirectory.

2. Download again for all other skins!
- Skins select from section 'Available skins'
- From every downloaded copy the "skins" subfolder into the "skins" subfolder of the first downloaded package.

3. Add custconfig.js from previous version to main package directory for updated version.

4. Download manually all optional plugins (see below). Download as 'Source', not 'Optimized'. Can skip download if date modified is before previous CKEditor upgrade. In this case copy plugin from the old package.
- Copy optional plugins into the "plugins" subfolder. Attention for respective directories.

    Optional plugins [folder names] are:

    image2
    Subfolder of main CKEditor
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/image2
    https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor-dev/tree/master/plugins/image2
    Integrated image captions. An option to center images. Dynamic "click and drag" resizing of images.
    Changed in plugin.js: insert,10 => image,1

    imageplus
    This is a plugin from Nikolay Petkov and replaces original image plugin addin a lot of new features.
    Copy from old installation, or see if is in GitHub.
    It is not uploaded in GitHub yet, but will.
    
    autosave
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/autosave
    https://github.com/w8tcha/CKEditor-AutoSave-Plugin

    leaflet
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/leaflet
    https://github.com/ranelpadon/ckeditor-leaflet
    Leaflet is an open-source, lightweight, modular, and elegantly designed JavaScript map library.

    yaqr
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/yaqr
    https://github.com/devlabnet/Yaqr
    This widget is designed to easily create QR-Code Link Image.

    html5video
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/html5video
    https://github.com/bahriddin/ckeditor-html5-video

    html5audio
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/html5audio
    https://github.com/iametza/ckeditor-html5-audio

    youtube
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/youtube
    https://github.com/fonini/ckeditor-youtube-plugin
    
    videosnapshot
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/videosnapshot
    https://github.com/train255/videosnapshot
    Get video snapshot from the url

    codeTag
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/codeTag
    https://github.com/danielsvane/ckeditor-code-tag
    Wraps selected text in a <code></code> tag.

    googlesearch
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/googlesearch
    https://github.com/prafullr/googlesearch
    Changed in plugin.js: find,1

    codemirror
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/codemirror
    https://github.com/w8tcha/CKEditor-CodeMirror-Plugin

    media
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/media
    https://github.com/akilli/ck4-media

    embed
    Subdirectory in main CKEditor
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/embed
    https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor-dev/tree/master/plugins/embed
    Media Embed. This plugin lets you embed media resources directly in the editor.

    ckawesome
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/ckawesome
    https://github.com/brstuff/ckawesome
    CKAwesome allows you to easily insert a Font Awesome icon into your text in CKEditor

    symbol
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/symbol
    This is a modified version of Frederico Knabben's specialCharacter plugin. It gives the user the possibility to insert most unicode symbols.

    textselection
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/textselection
    https://github.com/w8tcha/CKEditor-TextSelection-Plugin
    The plugin that makes the editor keep it's text-selection when switching between WYSIWYG and Source mode, and scrolls the selection into the viewport.

    texttransform
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/texttransform
    https://github.com/onderceylan/ckeditor-texttransform-plugin
    transforming selected text to new cases. You can transform selected text to uppercase, lowercase or simply capitalize it.

    openlink
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/openlink
    https://github.com/mlewand/ckeditor-plugin-openlink/
    Extends the editor context menu with a possibility to open the link in a new tab. 

    wsc
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/wsc
    https://github.com/WebSpellChecker/ckeditor-plugin-wsc
    WebSpellChecker. This plugin brings spell checking in a dialog window into CKEditor.

    scayt
    https://ckeditor.com/cke4/addon/scayt
    https://github.com/WebSpellChecker/ckeditor-plugin-scayt/
    This plugin brings Spell Check As You Type (SCAYT) functionality into CKEditor.
    SCAYT is "installation-less", using the web services of WebSpellChecker.net.
